title: Inui-san!
synopsis: Included in the Ciao Ciao TV bonus DVD that bundled with the  issues of the Ciao magazine. (Source: AniDB)

title: Yomigaeru Sora Pilot
synopsis: Yomigaeru Sora was initially supposed to have a female protagonist with sharper animation. Due to Yuji Matsukura (J.C.Staff Executive Officer, Head of Production), Katsushi Sakurabi (Director), and Fumihiko Takayama (Series Composition) outvoting Kiyoshi Sugiyama (Producer), the story was changed to have a male protagonist with simpler animation. Sakurabi's original idea for the anime was made into pilot and the pilot was included with the 7th volume of the Limited Edition DVD Box Set.

title: Ane Log: Moyako Neesan no Tomaranai Monologue
synopsis: When Konoe Moyako and her little brother, Akira, were young, he said he wanted to marry her. Naturally, Moyako decided that her little brother was a complete pervert who was obsessed with her. Now that they're both teenagers, Moyako is convinced she needs to "rehabilitate" him. However, it seems that the "perversion" is entirely in her imagination, and she can't seem to help turning completely innocent situations into creepy ones in her mind! (Source: MU) Bundled with the limited edition 5th, 6th, and 7th manga volumes.

details.Japanese: 姉ログ 靄子姉さんの止まらないモノローグ

title: Persona 3 the Movie 3: Falling Down
synopsis: As the fall season nears its end, Chidori Yoshino, a member of Strega, abducts Junpei Iori. Meanwhile, Makoto Yuuki and the Specialized Extracurricular Execution Squad (SEES) annihilate the Arcana Hanged Man. Soon after, a mysterious playboy named Ryouji Mochizuki transfers into Gekkoukan High School's Class 2-F. Supposedly having achieved their goal, the members of SEES believe they are free from the battle that has ruthlessly stolen away the lives of their loved ones. And yet, Tartarus and the Dark Hour continue to exist, undeterred by the extermination of the twelfth Shadow. Distraught by their apparent failure, SEES must cope with their personal struggles and discover whose sake they fight for. As Makoto and Junpei's journeys of self-discovery progress, Ryouji's identity and the reason behind Aegis's hate for him become clear.

title: Naniwabushi Daisuki
synopsis: Two stories that mix animation with naniwabushi (storytelling accompanied by shamisen playing). One is a tale of General Nogi, the famous suicide, visiting the shrines at lse on his way to Nagoya, while his wife is mistaken for a commoner as she books into a hotel. The second story is of a sumo wrestling trainee, ridiculed by his fellows, who trains hard and avenges himself-the standard cliches of a sports anime, just with plink-plonky music on top of it. (Source: The Anime Encyclopedia)

title: Neko to Nezumi
synopsis: It is most likely a short story about a cat and a mouse.

details.Synonyms: Cat and Mice, Cat and Mouse

title: Yume no Jidousha

title: Imokawa Mukuzo: Chuugaeri no Maki
synopsis: It is most likely a story about a Mukuzo Imokawa doing the somersault. (Source: Anime Database Wiki)

title: Youkai Watch Movie 1: Tanjou no Himitsu da Nyan!
synopsis: The movie will feature special guests such as popular familiar characters from the TV anime series and the latest Youkai from the upcoming Youkai Watch 2 sequel games.
background: Winner of the 2016 Japan Movie Critics Awards for Best Family Animation of the Year.

details.English: Yo-kai Watch the Movie: It's the Secret of Birth, Meow!
